name: Little Einar
description: A Virtual Reality platform game that plays along walls in your virtual space.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel™ Core™ i5-4590 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1070 Storage: 2 GB available space
